lead_paragraph: The complaint contends that Syrian officials worked in concert to locate, track and target journalists like Ms. Colvin, who was killed in an artillery strike in 2012.

headline.print_headline: Family Sues  Syria in Death of Reporter in 2012 Strike
headline.main: Family of Marie Colvin, Slain U.S. Journalist, Sues Syria

snippet: The complaint contends that Syrian officials worked in concert to locate, track and target journalists like Ms. Colvin, who was killed in an artillery strike in 2012....
abstract: Family of deceased American war reporter Marie Colvin file wrongful-death lawsuit against Syrian government; civil complaint in Washington federal court accuses Pres Bashar al-Assad's brother Maher and other high-ranking officials of systematically targeting, tracking and silencing foreign journalists; Colvin was killed in 2012 when government forces shelled building used by journalists.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
